content.webTitle: What can I do to get rid of a moth infestation?

fields.headline: What can I do to get rid of a moth infestation?
fields.bodyText: Every week a Guardian Money reader submits a question, and it’s up to you to help him or her out – a selection of the best answers will appear in next Saturday’s paper. Like many others seemingly, we have a huge problem with moths infesting our house. I need a cost-effective solution that, ideally, doesn’t involve toxic chemicals. Must the wool carpets go? How have others solved this? Do you have a problem readers could solve? Email your suggestions to money@theguardian.com or write to us at Money, the Guardian, Kings Place, 90 York Way, London N1 9GU.
